sentences.en: Adams took a succession of jobs which have stood him in good stead.
sentences.cn: 当斯连着做过几份让他颇为受益的工作。

sentences.en: And in stead , I found everything that I'd ever been looking for my whole life.
sentences.cn: 就在那时, 我找到了我一生都在追求的.

sentences.en: He came close to the painter and looked stead - fastly into his stern eyes.
sentences.cn: 他走近画家,并且死死地盯着他那目光严峻的眼睛.

sentences.en: Here again my old caution stood me in good stead.
sentences.cn: 这一次我那种向来不变的谨慎又给我许多好处.

sentences.en: his early training stood him in good stead.
sentences.cn: 他早期受的训练对他的将来有好处。

sentences.en: His personal relationship with the electorate stands in good stead ( John Sears )
sentences.cn: 他与选民的个人关系是有很大帮助的 ( 约翰西尔斯 )

sentences.en: I can't attend the meeting but I'll send my assistant in my stead.
sentences.cn: 这个会我来不了,我让助手代我出席.

sentences.en: I've always felt that solid experience would stand me in good stead.
sentences.cn: 我总觉得实实在在的经历会对我有利的。

sentences.en: My anorak has stood me in good stead this winter.
sentences.cn: 我这件皮猴儿今年冬天可帮了大忙了.

sentences.en: My grandmother and aunt will be there in my parents' stead.
sentences.cn: 我的祖母和姑妈将代替我的父母出席。

sentences.en: My knowledge of French stood me in good stead when I traveled in France.
sentences.cn: 我在法国旅游时,我的法语知识很有用.

sentences.en: My years of teaching stood me in good stead.
sentences.cn: 多年的执教经验令我大受裨益。

sentences.en: On the 19 th, General Gamelin was dismissed, and Weygand reigned in his stead.
sentences.cn: 19日, 甘默林将军被免职, 由魏刚接任.

sentences.en: She asked me to attend the meeting in her stead.
sentences.cn: 她要我替她去参加会议.

sentences.en: These two games here will stand them in good stead for the future.
sentences.cn: 现在的这两场比赛将对他们今后很有利。

phrases.tran_cn: （将来）对某人有好处，对某人有用处

trans.tran_en: If you do something in someone's stead, you replace them and do it instead of them.
